quotes.quote: There's no better friend than a sister.
quotes.author: Mary Engelbreit

quotes.quote: A sister is both your mirror and your opposite.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Fishel

quotes.quote: You know full well as I do the value of sisters' affections; there is nothing like it in this world.
quotes.author: Charlotte Brontë

quotes.quote: Sisters are like flowers in the garden of life.
You're not my best friend. You're my sister, and that's more.
quotes.author: Jenny Han

quotes.quote: A sister is a gift to the heart, a friend to the spirit, a golden thread to the meaning of life.
One's sister is part of one's essential self, an eternal presence of one's heart, soul and memory.
To have a loving relationship with a sister is not simply to have a buddy or a confidant... It is to have a soul mate for life.
My sisters are my favorite people on earth.
quotes.author: Ryan Phillippe

quotes.quote: A sister is one who reaches for your hand and touches your heart.
